comment.author: 52571809@N08
comment._content: I think my grandad is one of the men in this photograph, ( Scotch troops at the entrance to their hut on New Year's day), digital.nls.uk/74548010.  If anyone knows the name of any of these men It would be great to hear from you. I can be contacted via my email im.ryan@btinternet.com.

comment.author: 62550160@N05
comment._content: It looks like the Black Watch but which battalion ? My Granddad was in the 6th BW, 51st Highland Div and my Gt Uncle was in the 8th BW, 9th Scottish Div.
